description: Detects a new and suspicious printer port creation in Registry that could be an attempt to exploit CVE-2020-1048
false_positives: New printer port install on host
name: Suspicious New Printer Ports in Registry (CVE-2020-1048)
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Ports* AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*.dll* OR *.exe* OR *.bat* OR *.com* OR *C\:*))
author: EagleEye Team
Florian Roth
NVISO
